oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ajwibat al-asʼilah al-ithnay ʻashar fī al-ʻulūm al-ithnay ʻashar : wa-hiya al-ṣarf wa-al-naḥw wa-al-fiqh wa-al-ḥadīth wa-al-tafsīr wa-al-kalām wa-al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-ādāb al-baḥth wa-al-manṭiq wa-al-ḥikmah wa-al-hayʼah / li-Ibn Abī Bakr al-Kurdī : manuscript, 1582
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kurdī, ʻAbd al-Nabī ibn Abī Bakr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 10v), copy completed on 5 Rabīʻ al-awwal 990 AH [March 22, 1582 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Abūṣīrī al-Azharī.
Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper. 18 x 13 cm. (13 x 9 cm.).
MS Arab 252. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic language--Grammar
Arabic language--Rhetoric
Islam--Doctrines
Islamic philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: كردي، عبد النبي بن أبي بكر.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: أجوبة الأسئلة الإثني عشر في العلوم الإثني عشر : وهي الصرف والنحو والفقه والحديث والتفسير والكلام والمعاني والبيان وآداب البحث والمنطق والحكمة والهيئة / لابن أبي بكر الكردي : مخطوطة، 1582
